verses.name: John 20:11
verses.text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping: and as she wept, she stooped down, and looked into the sepulchre,

verses.name: John 20:12
verses.text: And seeth two angels in white sitting, the one at the head, and the other at the feet, where the body of Jesus had lain.

verses.name: John 20:13
verses.text: And they say unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? She saith unto them, Because they have taken away my Lord, and I know not where they have laid him.

verses.name: John 20:14
verses.text: And when she had thus said, she turned herself back, and saw Jesus standing, and knew not that it was Jesus.
